title: Can you answer these queries VI
text:
Given a sequence A of N(N ≤ 100000)integers, you have to apply Q(Q ≤ 100000)operations:Insert, delete, replace an element, find the maximum contiguous (non empty) sum in a given interval.InputThe first line of the input contains an integer N.The following line contains N integers, representing the starting sequence A1..AN,(|Ai| ≤ 10000).The third line contains an integer Q. The next Q lines contains the operations in following form:I x y: insert element y at position x(between x - 1 and x).D x: delete the element at position x.R x y: replace element at position x with y.Q x y: print max{Ai + Ai+1 + .. + Aj | x ≤ i ≤ j ≤ y}.All given positions are valid, and given values are between -10000 and +10000.The sequence will never be empty.OutputFor each "Q" operation, print an integer (one per line) as described above.ExampleInput:5
3 -4 3 -1 6
10
I 6 2
Q 3 5
R 5 -4
Q 3 5
D 2
Q 1 5
I 2 -10
Q 1 6
R 2 -1
Q 1 6Output:8
3
6
3
5
